inclusion.criterion: Patients with an asymptomatic stenosis >80% (NASCET) with a documented progression of the degree of stenosis to >80% within 6 months with a very tight stenosis ≥90% at initial presentation with a >80% stenosis plus silent ipsilateral ischemia documented by CCT or MRI
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: with ipsilateral >80% stenosis plus contralateral >80% stenosis or occlusion
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: with >80% stenosis plus planned major surgery
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Neurologist´s explicit consent to potentially perform CAS
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Underlying disease other than atherosclerosis (inflammatory or autoimmune disease)
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Unstable severe cardiovascular comorbidities (e.g. unstable angina, heart failure)
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Restenosis after prior CAS or CEA
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has a history of CAD s/p CABG and PVD with significant carotid stenosis. He reports occasional dizziness but no prior syncope or sensory/motor defects.
